amendment.description: To modify the requirements for a water and waste disposal grant to the city of Postville, Iowa.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2134 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2134 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S14142-14143; text: CR S14143) To modify the requirements for a water and waste disposal grant to the city of Postville, Iowa.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2134 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2134 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Harkin.
